A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately it appears that Disney has decided to turn the Star Wars franchise into a series of comic book movies. Story is sacrificed in favor of ham-fisted moralizing. Character development has been tossed out the window to give us invincible heroes from the first frame. Emotion is gone\, only to be replaced by overwrought action scenes. If given the choice\, I would actually rather rewatch the prequels.
